nodes.text: Star Wars: Galactic Starcruiser is an upcoming hotel developed by The Walt Disney Company for Walt Disney World Resort. The hotel, originally set to open in 2021 but moved to a 2022 opening, is set on a starship named Halcyon operated by Chandrila Star Line.

Guests will be able to experience a two-night adventure where they will interact with characters and become participants of in-universe activities. The hotel will be connected to the nearby Star Wars: Galaxy's Edge area of Disney's Hollywood Studios.
